title: Dark mode
description: For the night owls, the pros and the avid readers.

title: Feedboard Weekly
description: Automated custom weekly newsletter based on your feeds.

title: Performance improvements
description: Performance improvements to increase feeds reliability and minor UI changes.

title: Behance
description: Add your favourite Behance artists to create a beautiful inspiring Feedboard.

title: Substack bug fixes
description: This hotfix limits the number of Substack publications that can be added due to a problem in the libray currently used. We are investigating into a fix to bring back multiple Substack soon.

title: Medium feed
description: Medium is now integrated in Feedboard and you can add your favourite authors and follow their publications.

title: Coingecko Top 100
description: You can now add a feed from Coingecko for the top 100 coins by marketcap.

title: Accessiblity improvements
description: Small improvements around accessibility and SEO.

title: Pinterest feed
description: You can now add a Pinterest feed for users and or boards. The functionality is currently in Beta as Pinterest feeds can be a bit unreliable sometimes. Sometimes just reloading the board fixes the issue.

title: Telegram feed
description: Telegram feeds for public channels are now available and can be added to your board.

title: Added Changelog
description: Added this changelog modal to keep track of all things new on every release.

title: List of upcoming feeds
description: Added a list of upcoming feeds like Telegram public channels, Coingecko and TechCrunch News.

title: Google single sign-on
description: Added Google SSO to offer more signup options.

title: Launch ðŸš€
description: Feedboard.app version 1 is live and includes Subreddit, YouTube channels, Substack, Unsplash, HackerNews and ProductHunt.
